data.name: Pusheep
data.detailed_description:
‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ .・。.・゜✭・.・✫・゜・。.
‎‏‏‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎PUSHEEP
✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* ✧*:･ﾟ✧ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* ✧

PUSHEEP is a very simple yet challenging puzzle game about planning your moves to achieve one clear goal, removing all evil sheep from your beautiful floating islands.

Help the sheep warriors outsmart all evil enemies and push them away from their lands.
Embark on a new adventure that puts designing a good and rewarding puzzle its main priority.

Not convinced yet?
⚠ Please keep in mind that you can always download the demo before purchasing the full game. The demo contains the first 12 levels. ⚠

(ﾉ◕ヮ◕)ﾉ*:･ﾟ✧

‎

⊱ ────── {⋅. PUSH evil SHEEP away.⋅} ────── ⊰


Follow the Sheep Warriors on a quest of removing all evil from their lands with intellect and a little force, in 80 challenging levels.

⊱ ────── {⋅. Discover rich areas.⋅} ────── ⊰


Embark on a challenging adventure in various zones with themed puzzles and new mechanics that transform a very simple concept into a difficult but exciting endeavor.



‎‏‏‎

⊱ ────── {⋅. Solve challenging puzzles.⋅} ────── ⊰


Engage in a nonlinear experience full of surprisingly complex intellectual challenges, and discover all mysteries that this world has to offer

\^o^/


‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎‏‏‎ ‎‏ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* ✧*:･ﾟ✧ ✧･ﾟ: *✧･ﾟ:* ✧

Don't Forget to Wishlist the Game On Steam.


Also, I will be happy to read your opinion on the game. Things that you liked/disliked, additional features, potential bugs...
A form is available in the Pause menu.

data.short_description: Pusheep is a very simple yet challenging puzzle game about planning your moves to achieve one clear goal, removing all evil sheep from your beautiful floating islands.
data.reviews:
“One of the things I do enjoy most about it is that it can be picked up and played quite easily, it's easy to get into and it can be a bit hard to put down.”
Big Mike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G2030 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 500 series or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Electricity, a working Screen, mouse, and a computer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Electricity, a working Screen, mouse, and a good computer (Optional: Snacks)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel 2.20GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13
  • Processor: Intel 2.70GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 560X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Pentium G2030 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 500 series
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.00GHz or higher
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX960 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
